title: 2020 Week 3 Preview
itunes:title: 2020 Week 3 Preview
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal preview every single upcoming game for Week 3 starting with the huge Monday night face off between the leagues two most exciting quarterbacks. (2:40) Gregg claims that the Saints are playing in a cornered animal game (25:25) and some of the heroes think that the Texans have a chance against the Steelers (28:55). Marc drops an "on the reg" when referring to how many points the Bucs will score (44:00) and you can hear the sadness in Dan's voice while previewing the Jets. (1:00) Programming note: Ricky Hollywood locked up the Cardinals off air.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
